panels.name: Pending tasks
panels.description: 等待执行的集群变更任务数量

panels.name: Cluster health
panels.description: 绿色：健康，黄色：存在副本分片异常，红色：存在主分片异常

panels.name: Active shards
panels.description:
活跃分片数
Aggregate total of all shards across all indices, which includes replica shards

panels.name: Active primary shards
panels.description:
活跃主分片数
The number of primary shards in your cluster. This is an aggregate total across all indices.

panels.name: Initializing shards
panels.description:
创建中分片数量
Count of shards that are being freshly created

panels.name: Relocating shards
panels.description:
迁移中分片数量
The number of shards that are currently moving from one node to another node.

panels.name: Unassigned shards
panels.description:
未分配的分片数量
The number of shards that exist in the cluster state, but cannot be found in the cluster itself

panels.name: Delayed shards
panels.description:
暂缓分配的分片数量，当节点丢失，会发生选主和数据拷贝。为了较少网络抖动等原因导致的重分配情况，配置delay参数，该值为等待delay到期将被重分配的分片数量
Shards delayed to reduce reallocation overhead

panels.name: Estimated size in bytes of breaker
panels.description: 预估内存大小和限制内存大小

panels.name: JVM memory usage
panels.description: 进程内存占用/限制/峰值（byte）

panels.name: Documents count on node
panels.description: 节点文档总数，不包含已删除文档和子文档以及刚索引的文档

panels.name: Documents merged bytes
panels.description: 平均每秒合并文档大小

panels.name: Thread Pool threads queued
panels.description: 排队等待线程任务数量

panels.name: Field data evictions
panels.description: fielddata cache平均每秒内存剔除次数

panels.name: Query cache evictions
panels.description: query cache平均每秒内存剔除次数

panels.name: Evictions from filter cache
panels.description: 老版本的filter cache内存剔除次数

panels.name: Current memory size of segments in bytes
Indices: Count of documents and Total size
Count of documents with only primary shards
Total size of stored index data in bytes with only primary shards on all nodes
Total size of stored index data in bytes with all shards on all nodes
Index writer with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 主分片索引写入数据量（byte）

panels.name: Index writer with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片索引写入数据量（byte）

panels.name: Segments with only primary shards on all nodes
Segments with all shards on all nodes
Size of segments with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of segments with all shards on all nodes in bytes
Doc values with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Doc values with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片doc value内存占用（byte）

panels.name: Size of fields with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of fields with all shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of fixed bit with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 主分片fixed bit set内存占用（byte）

panels.name: Size of fixed bit with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片fixed bit set内存占用（byte）

panels.name: Size of norms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of norms with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片normalization factor内存占用（byte）

panels.name: Size of points with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of points with all shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of terms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
Number of terms with all shards on all nodes in bytes
Size of version map with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片version map内存占用（byte）

panels.name: Size of version map with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.description: 所有分片version map内存占用（byte）
